DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study DCE MR image detect vascular change vagina radiotherapy n patient receive adjuvant brachytherapyfor cervical endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Suitability DCE-MRI Detection Vascular Changes After VBT
DOC.criteria: Must 18 year age . Must histologically confirm carcinoma cervix , carcinoma carcinosarcoma uterus . Subjects receive intracavitary brachytherapy . ECOG performance status 02 . Creatinine clearance 30 . Subjects inability tolerate MR imaging ( i.e . claustrphobia ) Study subject contraindication MRI scanning limited subject pacemaker , metal fragment eye certain metallic implant . Patients speak read English .
